0x00010000  ldr r0, [r15, #0x2c]
0x00010004  ldr r1, [r15, #0x2c]
0x00010008  ldrb r3, [r1]
0x0001000c  str r3, [r0]
0x00010010  add r1, r1, #0x1
0x00010014  ldrb r3, [r1]
0x00010018  cmp r3, #0x0
0x0001001c  bne [r15, #-0x18]
0x00010020  b [r15, #-0x8]
0x00010024  68 65 6c 6c
0x00010028  6f 2c 20 77
0x0001002c  6f 72 6c 64
0x00010030  0a 00 00 00
0x00010034  00 10 1f 10
0x00010038  24 00 01 00
